channel.title: The Spodcast
channel.itunes:author: Josh, Chris, Rutskan, and Mumbles?
channel.itunes:subtitle: Like Spoiler Warning, but with less video.

item.title: The Spodcast #19: Sniffles, Gambling, and Orlando in Orlando
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
This week: Everyone’s sick, Alex invades Florida, and we muse over EA’s prodigious bungling of loot boxes and Star Wars.

Show Notes:
1:38 – Alex Orlando was in Orlando
28:20 – Battlefront 2, Loot Boxes, and Game Budgets
57:16 – But what is Battlefield 2 like to play anyway?
item.itunes:author: The Diecast
item.itunes:summary:
This week: Everyone’s sick, Alex invades Florida, and we muse over EA’s prodigious bungling of loot boxes and Star Wars.
Show Notes: 1:38 – Alex Orlando was in Orlando 28:20 – Battlefront 2, Loot Boxes, and Game Budgets 57:16 – But what is Battlefield 2 like to play anyway?

item.title: Save vs. Death EP1: Attack of the Soup Monsters
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
This holiday season, it’s always good to remember what we’re thankful for. For example, that Dungeons and Dragons isn’t nearly as obtuse and inscrutable as it once was. And what better way to remind ourselves of that than to actually go back and try to play old D&D?

Welcome to Save vs. Death, the series where Josh and Rutskarn attempt to survive a playthrough of Dungeons and Dragons 2nd edition! THAC0! Two completely different ways to multi-class! No encounter tables!

Will any of our stalwart hosts make it out alive?
item.itunes:author: The Diecast
item.itunes:summary:
This holiday season, it’s always good to remember what we’re thankful for. For example, that Dungeons and Dragons isn’t nearly as obtuse and inscrutable as it once was. And what better way to remind ourselves of that than to actually go back and try to play old D&D?
Welcome to Save vs. Death, the series where Josh and Rutskarn attempt to survive a playthrough of Dungeons and Dragons 2nd edition! THAC0! Two completely different ways to multi-class! No encounter tables!
Will any of our stalwart hosts make it out alive?

item.title: The Spodcast #18: Fortnite, Ancient Egypt, And Chris Fieri
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
And just like that, a legend is born.

Show Notes:
1:10 – Warframe: Plains of Eidolon
18:42 – Assassin’s Creed: Origins
40:33 – Fortnite: Battle Royale
54:19 – Divinity: Original Sin 2
1:08:22 – Mailbag

item.title: The Spodcast #17: Halloween Horror Nights
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
It’s Halloween, so it’s the perfect time to talk about Halloween Haunted House Theme Parks! That’s right, it’s the Halloween Horror Nights edition of the Spodcast!

Show Notes:
0:30 – The Rise of Bootskarn and Dampster
1:39 – Halloween costumes
5:12 – Alex and Josh fail at Halloween parties, get lost in Long Beach instead
25:14 – Everything you ever wanted to know about Halloween Horror Nights
item.itunes:author: The Diecast
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: The Spodcast #16: The Spooky Roundtable
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
This week on the Spodcast, we get spoopy as we discuss all the stuff we love and hate about Horror.

Show Notes:
2:23 – An unrelated foray into more XCOM 2
8:30 – Horror Roundtable
9:15 – What’s Alex’s relationship with scary games?
16:20 – What does Chris think about jumpscares?
36:41 – Does Josh play horror games differently when he’s not recording?
47:41 – Good jump scares

item.itunes:summary:
This week on the Spodcast, we get spoopy as we discuss all the stuff we love and hate about Horror.

item.title: The Spodcast #15: Wine, Bad Dates, Backlogs, and Hair Metal
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
Mumbles returns to tell us about Mystic Messenger, we discuss our massive Steam backlogs, get abducted by aliens, and try to remember the names of obscure hair metal bands on this jam-packed episode of the Spodcast!

Show Notes:
0:41 – Danganronpa
8:25 – Alex did a Warframe charity stream
10:30 – Ruiner
16:35 – Mystic Messenger V Route
25:43 – Wine and Painting
32:12 – Cuphead
39:22 – Stories Untold
43:30 – Heat Signature
47:13 – XCOM 2: War of the Chosen
1:08:25 – Mailbag: “What do you think of all the games you buy but don’t ever get around to playing?”
item.itunes:author: The Diecast
item.itunes:summary:
Mumbles returns to tell us about Mystic Messenger, we discuss our massive Steam backlogs, get abducted by aliens, and try to remember the names of obscure hair metal bands on this jam-packed episode of the Spodcast!

item.title: The Spodcast #14: Star Trek And Erotic Questions
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
Things get spicy in space in this installment of the Spodcast!

Show Notes:
1:16 – Star Trek Discovery Pilot Discussion (SPOILERS!)
35:21 – Mailbag
37:10 – Have you tried erotic games funded by Patreon?
45:15 – Do you have any thoughts on a game’s ending being decided by player choice vs player action?
55:00 – Are you aware of the homebrew erotic game genre?

item.title: The Spodcast #12: TwitchCon, Dauntless, And Guild Wars 2
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
Recording times didn’t work out quite the way we’d hoped this week, so everyone got to be just a little bit loopy in this episode of the Spodcast, where we discuss fast food, travel, the dark ages of Web 1.0, and–ever so occasionally–video games.

Show Notes:
1:08 – The Ancient Internet
5:16 – Fast Food or something
9:18 – TwitchCon
28:10 – Guild Wars 2
47:15 – Dauntless
52:47 – Mailbag
53:12 – What long-running franchise have you played the most games in?
1:03:43 – What are some of your favorite gaming protagonists?
item.itunes:author: The Diecast
item.itunes:summary:
Recording times didn’t work out quite the way we’d hoped this week, so everyone got to be just a little bit loopy in this episode of the Spodcast, where we discuss fast food, travel, the dark ages of Web 1.0, and–ever so occasionally–video games.

item.title: The Spodcast #11: Bad Habits, Proper Nouns, and the Historical Veracity of the Existence of Hel
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
We play dress-up, forget everyone’s name, and Campster becomes very confused about the metaphysical concept of the underworld.

0:27 – GOG Pinata sale
9:20 – Glitch vs Spooky Noises
12:03 – Love Nikki-Dress UP Queen
17:39 – Hellblade: Senua’s Sacrifice
20:45 – Hellblade SPOILERS
31:07 – The Signal from Tolva and Sir, You Are Being Hunted
38:17 – Roundtable Topic: Have you ever imposed a rule on a game that diminished the experience for yourself?
53:10 – Mailbag: Which is your favorite daughter of Sad-Dads in games?

item.title: The Spodcast #8: Disney, Spider-Man, and Potato People
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
Glitch, Josh, Mumbles and Chris put their heads together to find out if it’s even possible to talk about video games on this show.

item.title: The Spodcast #7: VR, SNES Classic, and the Han Solo Blues
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
With everyone on vacation, we’ve got a skeleton crew this week, but Glitch, Josh, and Campster manage to get together to talk about Nintendo, the current state of VR, the new Han Solo director, and more!

5:15 – Nintendo Switch travel impressions
18:00 – The Current State of VR
35:35 – Steam Sale
42:45 – SNES Classic
53:10 – Han Solo Director Troubles
1:08:10 – Mailbag
1:08:45 – Who would play you in the movie adaptation of Spoiler Warning?
1:14:25 – What do you think of the new XBox and do you have unfiltered wheat bear?
1:20:20 – What are your favorite game reviewers?
1:25:45 – Do you plan on watching the solar eclipse on the 21st of August?

item.title: The Spodcast – RPG Sessions #1: Character Creation
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description: Rutskarn’s been wanting to do a tabletop RPG with the Spoiler Warning cast for years, so in this special podcast episode, we create our characters. We’ll be doing more of these occasionally in the future, so let us know what you think!
item.itunes:author: The Diecast
item.itunes:summary: Rutskarn’s been wanting to do a tabletop RPG with the Spoiler Warning cast for years, so in this special podcast episode, we create our characters. We’ll be doing more of these occasionally in the future, so let us know what you think!

item.title: The Spodcast #6: Electronic Entertainment Expo Extravaganza
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
E3 2017 is over, so now it’s time to share our thoughts on this whole crazy thing.

3:35 – Electronic Arts
22:40 – Microsoft
43:45 – Josh takes a break so Duck Tales?

54:10 – Ubisoft
1:09:10 – Sony
1:16:50 – Nintendo

item.title: The Spodcast #5: Not E3, Bad Games, and Guardians of the Galaxy 2
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
Recorded on the eve of E3, we instead talk about other conferences that weren’t E3. Also, Glitch returns to talk about Guardians of the Galaxy 2, we discuss the bad games we still enjoy, and more!

2:20 – We talk about not talking about E3
6:35 – Guardians of the Galaxy 2 (SPOILERS)
34:00 – Josh got a Switch somehow
40:05 – A tale of two Academic Conferences
54:10 – Enjoying Bad Games
1:13:45 – Mailbag
1:14 20 – Which games have you gotten really deep into because you enjoyed the mechanics so much?
1:29:35 – What do you think about politics in games?

item.title: Spodcast #4: Switches, Steam and MUD Fights
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
As we gear up for E3, we discuss the news of the Switch online service, Steam Direct, and rumors about another Life is Strange game. And then things get dirty as Rutskarn regales us with a cautionary tale about MUDs.

3:30 – We’ll be talking over the E3 press conferences! You can catch those at our Twitch Channel
11:05 – Nintendo unveils plans for the Switch online service
39:25 – Steam Direct fee and curation plans
53:50 – Life is Strange Prequel rumors
1:02:55 – Rutskarn rants about MUDs


Featuring: "Off to Osaka" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

item.title: The Spodcast #2: Destiny 2, Prey, and Typhoid Burgers

item.title: The Spoiler Warning Podcast #1
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast
item.description:
It seems only appropriate for us to try one of these things.

This was a little later than intended, but migraines be damned, it's going up tonight!

2:30 - Spoiler Warning is leaving Twenty Sided. 

I didn't want to get too far into this on the podcast, but if you want to know more about the circumstances that led to the split, I wrote about it on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/posts/well-that-9299827

6:30 - Sleeping Dogs is getting a movie?

18:15 - Would Quantic Dream games be better or worse as films?

22:45 - E3 and bad trailers

31:05 - Prey

46:55 - PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS


Featuring: "Off to Osaka" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
item.itunes:author: The Diecast
item.itunes:summary:
It seems only appropriate for us to try one of these things. This was a little later than intended, but migraines be damned, it's going up tonight!
